dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 256 IH: Stop Wasting Archive Grants Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Chaffetz introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend title 44, United States Code, to repeal the National Historical Publications and Records Commission, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stop Wasting Archive Grants Act of 2013.

section.header: Repeal of National Historical Publications and Records Commission

subsection.text: Chapter 25 of title 44, United States Code, is repealed.
The table of sections at the beginning of such chapter is repealed.
